item.description: Fine-tuning LLaMa 3 8B Instruct on Intel Max Series GPUs ðŸš€ Intel GPUs offer incredible speed and cost-effectiveness. I successfully trained the LLaMa 3 8B Instruct model using my custom dataset. By leveraging HuggingFace, I imported my dataset, obtained the LLaMa 3 8B Instruct model, and trained it using the Transformer Trainer. The entire training process was meticulously monitored by Weights and Biases, providing detailed insights into memory usage, disk I/O, training loss, and more.
